items.label: Get products in a specific category

Cart/AddCart.title: Add a new product
Cart/AddCart.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to add new products to the cart.

Cart/DeleteCart.title: Delete a cart
Cart/DeleteCart.description: This reference shows that this API will not delete the cart from the database, but shows that if you successfully send data, it will return you the fake deleted cart.

Cart/GetAll.title: Get all
Cart/GetAll.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get all information about the cart.

Cart/GetDateRange.title: Get carts in date range
Cart/GetDateRange.description: This reference shows how to get carts in date range from a database.

Cart/GetSingle.title: Get a single
Cart/GetSingle.description: This reference shows how to get a single cart from the database.

Cart/GetUserCart.title: Get user cart
Cart/GetUserCart.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get the user's cart from the database.

Cart/LimitResults.title: Limit results
Cart/LimitResults.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to limit results from a database.

Cart/SortResults.title: Sort results
Cart/SortResults.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get sorted results from a database.

Cart/UpdateCart.title: Update a cart
Cart/UpdateCart.description: This reference show how to use APIs to update a cart from the database.

Login/userlogin.title: User login
Login/userlogin.description: This reference shows how to use APIs for the user to log in/sign in.

Products/AddNewProduct.title: Add new product
Products/AddNewProduct.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to add new product to a database.

Products/Delete.title: Delete a product
Products/Delete.description: This reference shows that this API will not delete the product from the database, but shows that if you successfully send data, it will return you the fake deleted product.

Products/GetAllCategories.title: Get all categories
Products/GetAllCategories.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get all categories of products in a database.

Products/GetAllProducts.title: Get all products
Products/GetAllProducts.description: This reference shows how to use an API to get all products in a database.

Products/GetInCategory.title: Get products in a specific category
Products/GetInCategory.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get products in a specific category of a database.

Products/GetSingleProduct.title: Get a single product
Products/GetSingleProduct.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get a single product in a database.

Products/LimitResults.title: Limit results
Products/LimitResults.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to limit results of a request in a database.

Products/SortResults.title: Sort results
Products/SortResults.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to sort results in a database.

Products/Update.title: Update a product
Products/Update.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to update information of a product from the database.

User/Add.title: Add
User/Add.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to add users in a database.

User/Delete.title: Delete
User/Delete.description: This reference shows that this API will not delete the user from the database, but shows that if you successfully send data, it will return you the fake deleted user.

User/GetAllUsers.title: Get all
User/GetAllUsers.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get all users from the database.

User/GetSingleUser.title: Get a single
User/GetSingleUser.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to get a single user from the database.

User/LimitResults.title: Limit results
User/LimitResults.description: This reference shows how to limit results of user request in a database.

User/SortResults.title: Sort Results
User/SortResults.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to sort the results of a request in a database.

User/Update.title: Update
User/Update.description: This reference shows how to use APIs to update user's informations in a database.
